g.text: Write a Python function to calculate

What can you see in this image?
I can see a stunning mountain landscape featuring:

on a flower in slow motion
Top-2 Selected: E1 (Code) + E4 (Logic) + Shared Expert (DeepSeek-style)
User wants efficient fibonacci. Options: recursive, iterative, memoization.
Memoization gives O(n) time complexity. Best approach for efficiency.
if n in memo: return memo[n]
‚úì Keep: code block, explanation ‚Ä¢ Final output ready
Generating detailed scene description with object detection and spatial reasoning
"I can see a stunning mountain landscape featuring snow-capped peaks,
a clear blue sky, pine forests, and a serene alpine lake..."
Combining tool results with LLM knowledge
